video.title: Drop Dead Diva
video.synopsis: Shallow, stick-thin Deb Dobkins learns lessons about the joys of compassion and intelligence after she's reincarnated as a smart, plus-size lawyer.

episodes.synopsis: A fatal car accident sends the soul of a beautiful but vapid model into the body of a brilliant plus-size attorney.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A plus-sized cocktail waitress's workplace discrimination lawsuit helps Jane come to terms with her new body.
episodes.title: The F Word

episodes.synopsis: While retrying a lawsuit against a company whose work rules caused an employee's death, Jane's emotional outburst lands her in jail.
episodes.title: Do Over

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Kim represent a client who is unhappy with the dog he paid to have cloned from his late prizewinning golden retriever.
episodes.title: The Chinese Wall

episodes.synopsis: Jane's job is in jeopardy after she costs a wrongfully imprisoned man the settlement he's offered.
episodes.title: Lost & Found

episodes.synopsis: Jane defends a woman who has been a model citizen since fleeing a murder charge 20 years ago.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Jane goes after a popular diet guru whose weight-loss plan endangered a teenage girl's health.
episodes.title: The Magic Bullet

episodes.synopsis: While preparing for a reunion with her prom date, Jane defends an eccentric businessman.
episodes.title: Crazy

episodes.synopsis: After being shown the door at a trendy boutique because of her size, Jane takes on the store and their designer.
episodes.title: The Dress

episodes.synopsis: Jane looks to help a judge gain a refund from a high-priced matchmaker, and Grayson tries to settle a feud between two psychic sisters.
episodes.title: Make Me a Match

episodes.synopsis: While coping with her mother's unexpected visit, Jane looks to prove that a shy law office temp was accidentally switched at birth with another baby.
episodes.title: What if?

episodes.synopsis: Jane defends a supermodel against charges that she murdered her con man husband. A pro bono case exposes differences between Grayson and Kim.
episodes.title: Dead Model Walking

episodes.synopsis: Jane is assigned to represent a young baseball star whose pitching career was cut short by a botched operation.
episodes.title: Grayson's Anatomy

episodes.synopsis: Jane represents a young girl whose insurance company is refusing to pay for a potentially life-saving operation.
episodes.title: Would I Lie to You?

episodes.synopsis: Jane represents an amnesiac looking to reclaim his son after disappearing and being presumed dead for nine years.
episodes.title: Back From the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Kim wrestles with the idea of motherhood while fighting to reclaim a friend's baby from the surrogate mother.
episodes.title: The Long Road to Napa

episodes.synopsis: Tony and Jane's romantic relationship is affected by his new job. Meanwhile, Jane looks to keep Teri's cousin from being deported.
episodes.title: Home & Away

episodes.synopsis: When her mother is arrested for indecent exposure, Jane's defense exposes a well-kept family secret.
episodes.title: Senti-Mental Journey

episodes.synopsis: While assisting in the murder trial of a pop duo, Jane worries that Grayson is becoming fond of another lawyer on the case.
episodes.title: Begin Again

episodes.synopsis: When Bobbie asks Jane to help a family friend charged with theft, she learns that the woman in question is her half sister.
episodes.title: A Mother's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Kim and Grayson argue on behalf of a client whose sex change has jeopardized her potential inheritance.
episodes.title: Queen of Mean

episodes.synopsis: Grayson represents a couple claiming they were tricked into buying a haunted house.
episodes.title: Last Year's Model

episodes.synopsis: Jane defends a fugitive cop against theft charges intended to derail his investigation into corruption on the force.
episodes.title: Will & Grayson

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Grayson defend a client whose grief over his wife's tragic death has led him to dress like a clown.
episodes.title: Good Grief

episodes.synopsis: Her defense of a high school girl being bullied on the Internet makes Jane a target, too.
episodes.title: Bad Girls

episodes.synopsis: Jane argues the case of a terminally ill college professor who wants to be cryogenically frozen before she's dead.
episodes.title: Freeze the Day

episodes.synopsis: With Grayson in a coma, Jane represents an actor whose innocence she questions in a fatal hit-and-run case.
episodes.title: Hit and Run

episodes.synopsis: As Grayson asks for help planning his wedding, Jane joins Kim on a malpractice suit on behalf of a model who died while getting breast implants.
episodes.title: False Alarm

episodes.synopsis: As his exotic dancer clients threaten Grayson's plan to meet Vanessa's father, Jane represents a dwarf suing a sperm bank for negligence.
episodes.title: Dream Big

episodes.synopsis: While picking up Grayson's wedding rings, Jane is mugged -- and later ends up defending the critically ill thief in court.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: As Jane represents a lesbian couple being denied a chance to attend their prom together, Grayson helps a bailiff caught in a mail-order marriage scam.
episodes.title: Prom

episodes.synopsis: When she's assigned to help the district attorney's office with an old murder case, Jane learns she once worked there and had an affair with her boss.
episodes.title: Closure

episodes.synopsis: Jane's mom is arrested for using a grounded airplane's emergency exit. Meanwhile, Fred grows tired of Stacy's mothering and looks for his own place.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: While representing a college student who's accused the school's star quarterback of rape, Jane suspects loyal alumnus Grayson of undermining her case.
episodes.title: He Said, She Said

episodes.synopsis: As Stacy enlists Jane to represent a sorority sister in the lawsuit against a casino, Kim and Parker argue for a botanist's custody of a rare plant.
episodes.title: You Bet Your Life

episodes.synopsis: Jane agrees to help an angry parent stop a lead-contaminated high school from opening, even though the case will pit her against a client of the firm.
episodes.title: Toxic

episodes.synopsis: As Jane represents Parker's ex-girlfriend in a suit against an insurance company, Kim helps a minister who's exhorting his flock to steal for charity.
episodes.title: Ah, Men

episodes.synopsis: While Jane looks to help a TV show host injured in a bridal store's out-of-control promotion, a judge forces Grayson to try a case using medieval law.
episodes.title: Bride-a-Palooza

episodes.synopsis: After persuading a death-row inmate to donate his heart to his dying sister, Jane must get a judge to bend the execution rules to make it possible.
episodes.title: Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: Jane returns from Italy to defend a former law school classmate who has been charged with murder. Stacy looks to rekindle her romance with Fred.
episodes.title: Welcome Back

episodes.synopsis: Jane's efforts to help a teenage computer wizard reveal that he was kidnapped as a child. Kim defends her estranged father against a greedy CEO.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Stacy and Nikki visit the office to talk to Grayson about their "pake" business and run into Jane, who asks where they're getting the start-up money.
episodes.title: Freak Show

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Kim argue the case of a man whose wife committed suicide after being rejected by a TV makeover show. Parker gets a visit from his son.
episodes.title: Winning Ugly

episodes.synopsis: As Jane helps a woman avoid being forced to marry her country's crown prince, Parker defends a teacher who's fired for appearing in an adult film.
episodes.title: Happily Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Jane sues over a tragic oil rig accident but hits a snag when Kim represents the oil company. Meanwhile, Parker tries to gain custody of his son.
episodes.title: Rigged

episodes.synopsis: Jane defends a teenager accused of murdering a classmate, reviving questions surrounding the disappearance of the girl's father many years ago.
episodes.title: Crushed

episodes.synopsis: Jane finds herself at odds with her former mentor when she and Grayson supervise a law student's suit on behalf of a computer company employee.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Grayson represent a woman suing for custody of her late fiancé's ashes. And just as Jane starts to accept his disappearance, Owen returns.
episodes.title: Ashes to Ashes

episodes.synopsis: Bobbie Dobkins enlists Jane's help when a dance school student sues her over an injury. An ex-classmate hires Grayson for a lawsuit about a sculpture.
episodes.title: Lady Parts

episodes.synopsis: While Jane files a lawsuit for a teenager who collapsed at a rave, Kim and Grayson represent a sperm donor seeking to retain his parental rights.
episodes.title: Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: After teaming up to sue a big drug company, Jane worries that her partner, a high-profile trial lawyer, is mentally unsound.
episodes.title: Picks & Pakes

episodes.synopsis: As she works to persuade a friend to have a fatal brain tumor removed, Jane must confront her unresolved feelings for Grayson.
episodes.title: Jane's Getting Married

episodes.synopsis: Jane looks for Owen after his heart attack. Later, she fights to stop a drug company from ending the trial keeping an 8-year-old cancer patient alive.
episodes.title: Back from the Dead

episodes.synopsis: After taking over the body of a deceased lingerie model, Old Jane returns to enlist Jane in a death-row inmate's appeal.
episodes.title: The Real Jane

episodes.synopsis: As Jane reluctantly agrees to help a jilted bride-to-be sue her ex-fiancé, Grayson and Kim represent a surrogate mother cheated by a shady lawyer.
episodes.title: Surrogates

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Owen represent a high school athlete accused of cheating on the SAT. Meanwhile, Paul spies on Stacy after she starts acting strangely.
episodes.title: Cheaters

episodes.synopsis: When Jane defends a star baseball player accused of murder, she uncovers a secret that could end his career.
episodes.title: Secret Lives

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Owen represent a chemistry professor who's been duped into becoming a drug mule. Meanwhile, Stacy looks for a sperm donor among her exes.
episodes.title: Fool for Love

episodes.synopsis: Jane helps a beauty pageant contestant who insists the results are rigged. Meanwhile, Kim represents her estranged dad when he loses his coaching job.
episodes.title: Missed Congeniality

episodes.synopsis: As Jane tries to keep a friend's fiancé from being deported, Kim represents a writer whose erotic novel was plagiarized by a big publisher.
episodes.title: 50 Shades of Grayson

episodes.synopsis: Jane tries to save a shelter for battered women, putting the firm's future in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Grayson represents a teen claiming to be a vampire.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: As Owen and Grayson fight for a client's right to wed the woman he loves, Jane handles two divorces that resulted from unorthodox marriage therapy.
episodes.title: The Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Marked for death by a drug dealer, an ex-client looks to Jane for help. Meanwhile, Owen tries to stop the publication of a teen star's nude photo.
episodes.title: One Shot

episodes.synopsis: Jane represents Bobbie Dobkins, whose arrest for soliciting a male prostitute exposes the unorthodox steps she's taken to improve her sex life.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming?

episodes.synopsis: As Jane takes up an Amish farmer's fight against fracking, Grayson represents a dominatrix who's suing a deadbeat client.
episodes.title: Jane's Secret Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Jane struggles whether to come clean to Grayson about her real identity and uncovers a potentially felonious secret about a socially conscious client.
episodes.title: Truth & Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Grayson comes to terms with his feelings for Jane/Deb and represents a couple suing a cruise line, claiming a nightmare trip caused their divorce.
episodes.title: Soulmates

episodes.synopsis: Jane clashes with Belinda over helping an out-of-control rock star fired from his band, while preparing for her first non-Deb date with Grayson.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: Still bemused by Jane's revelation that she's Deb, Grayson has difficulty helping a childhood friend battle in-laws over where to bury his late wife.
episodes.title: Life & Death

episodes.synopsis: Jane's cheerleader client says she's being bullied by teammates, but may not be what she seems and Teri risks her job by posing as Paul's attorney.
episodes.title: Cheers & Jeers

episodes.synopsis: Jane and Grayson's client is arrested for treason, but the government won't provide details on the charges; meanwhile, Stacy thinks her baby is evil.
episodes.title: Desperate Housewife

episodes.synopsis: To help a dying teenager, Jane hunts for a bone marrow donor, while her relationship with Grayson grows complicated by a romantic confession.
episodes.title: Sister Act

episodes.synopsis: A client confesses to murder after a harsh interrogation, creating an ethical dilemma and traumatic series of events for Grayson, Jane and Owen.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Jane and a sick community fight a smelly hot-sauce factory and Grayson's battle with a bullet convinces him to act on his feelings for Jane.
episodes.title: Hope And Glory

episodes.synopsis: Jane deals with Grayson's untimely departure, Grayson pleads for a second chance at life and Kim's ventriloquist client's dummy is banned from flying.
episodes.title: No Return

episodes.synopsis: Jane's reason for wanting to halt a death row inmate's execution are deeply personal and Owen's anxiety about the upcoming wedding concerns Stacy.
episodes.title: Afterlife

episodes.synopsis: Grayson has trouble adjusting to his new life, while Owen and Kim's attitude about Ian (having no clue he is really Grayson) causes Jane to quit.
episodes.title: Hero

episodes.synopsis: Jane battles Owen in an anti-whaling group's lawsuit, Stacy's pregnancy and wedding plans collide and Ian is musically inspired to a romantic gesture.
episodes.title: It Had To Be You
